revised_title: Inquiry into the Variations of the Human Skull: Antero-Posterior Direction and Cranial Curvature
tldr: This study investigates the variations in the human skull, particularly in the antero-posterior direction, and explores the relationship between cranial curvature and national characteristics. The research suggests that the distinction between Dolichocephali and Brachycephali should be based on various characters, rather than just the cephalic index, and proposes new subdivisions for certain skull types.
